item.title: Commerce Secretary Lutnick Says He Is Confident U.S. Will Secure Trade Deal With EU
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose a 30 percent tariff on imports from Mexico and the European Union. on Aug. 1.

item.title: How to Differentiate Between Product and Project Management
item.description: Product and project leads aren’t the same, but your business needs both.

item.title: What Business Leaders Can Learn From Libraries About Driving Success and Growth
item.description: If you’re a leader wanting the market to realize the value of your business, take notes.

item.title: WNBA All-Star Party Wraps Up, Athlete Pay Comes Into Focus
item.description: Fans rallied around the players after the league’s union said recent contract talks were “a missed opportunity.”

item.title: 5 Questions to Consider When Deciding Whether to Start a Family Office
item.description: Ask better questions to understand the purpose, costs, structures, and whether your family is aligned.
